summary: This document outlines the Articles of Incorporation for Jeepers, Inc., detailing its purposes, powers, and the individuals involved in its formation. It includes information about the corporation's structure, management, and the appointment of a resident agent.

persons.name: Barbara Mignon Weatherly
persons.context: Barbara Mignon Weatherly is named as the resident agent for Jeepers, Inc. and is involved in the incorporation process.

persons.name: Ena Simon
persons.context: Ena Simon is listed as one of the incorporators of Jeepers, Inc.

persons.name: Mary R. Weber
persons.context: Mary R. Weber is also listed as one of the incorporators of Jeepers, Inc.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the President of Jeepers, Inc. and certifies the appointment of the resident agent.

persons.name: Maria Tankenson Hodge
persons.context: Maria Tankenson Hodge is appointed as the resident agent for Jeepers, Inc. in a resolution by the board of directors.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is mentioned as a director of Jeepers, Inc. in the board resolution.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein, as President of Jeepers, Inc., appoints Maria Tankenson Hodge as the resident agent.
Both Barbara Mignon Weatherly and Ena Simon are incorporators of Jeepers, Inc.
Both Barbara Mignon Weatherly and Mary R. Weber are incorporators of Jeepers, Inc.
Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke are both directors of Jeepers, Inc.

events.title: Incorporation of Jeepers, Inc.
events.description: The Articles of Incorporation for Jeepers, Inc. were filed, establishing the corporation and outlining its purposes and powers.

events.title: Appointment of Resident Agent
events.description: Maria Tankenson Hodge was appointed as the resident agent for Jeepers, Inc. by the board of directors.

locations: 41-42 Kongens Gade, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands
2-21 Bonne Esperance, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands
146-100 Anna's Retreat, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The corporation Jeepers, Inc. was established under the laws of the Virgin Islands.
Barbara Mignon Weatherly, Ena Simon, and Mary R. Weber are the incorporators of Jeepers, Inc.
Jeffrey Epstein serves as the President of Jeepers, Inc.
Maria Tankenson Hodge was appointed as the resident agent for Jeepers, Inc.
The corporation is authorized to issue 1,000 shares of common stock with no par value.
